name: Video Poker - FREE Las Vegas Casino Video Poker Suite Classic Deluxe Games
name_original: Video Poker - FREE Las Vegas Casino Video Poker Suite Classic Deluxe Games
description:
Video Poker Suite brings you FULL video poker experience wherever you go. With over 22 videopoker games, best poker trainer, real card shuffling and pay tables, you'll have Las Vegas with you anywhere, anytime.

＊FREE to Play with Free Credits every four hours. More free than any other Video Poker game.
＊Twenty two (22) different Video Poker games. More Video Poker games than any other.
＊Top Payouts on all Video Poker games.
＊Best Video Poker Trainer.
＊ Fast game play.
＊ Swipe your finger to hold multiple cards at once.
＊ Double Up Feature increase each round up to 4 times.
＊ Card shuffling like in real casinos.
＊ Game Center Leaderboard and Achievements.
＊ Free bonus game credits every four hours.
＊ Offline support

MORE Video Poker games than any other
